{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21271v1", "title": "BACKGAMMON: A Scheme for Producing High Intensity Muon Beams for Future
  Colliders and Other Applications", "summary": "We present a scheme for producing intense $\mu^+$ and $\mu^-$ lepton beams
that could be utilized in a future muon-muon or muon-ion collider, as well as
for other applications. The scheme makes use of BACKscattered GAMMas On
Nucleons (BACKGAMMON). Current accelerator infrastructures could be utilized to
produce the muon beams, such as the Electron-Ion Collider (EIC) at Brookhaven
National Laboratory in the United States. We discuss the implementation of
BACKGAMMON at the EIC.", "main_category": "physics.acc-ph", "categories": "physics.acc-ph,hep-ex", "published": "2025-04-30T02:57:40Z"}
